name: On a flight to Boston and enjoying my awesome Anker PowerPort Atom PD1 - https://amzn.to/2ZKPNvy - for charging my laptop and iPhone. Also loving Anker's MFi USB-C to Lightning cable to go along with it - https://amzn.to/2DHmcK6 - much more durable then Apple's.
